fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Kaze is a carrier of the wind. Kaze has the ability to pick up on the wind currents and alter the weather of certain areas. At night they are able to force someone to stay inside due to strong winds. Effectively roleblocking them.
Attributes:
- Kaze can not perform the factional kill and roleblock someone at the same time
- If no fox heads have been rolled roll a fox head
